remarks: An element covered by the lattice unit, when conjoined with an atom not under it, equals the lattice zero.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Jun-2012.)
statement:
lhpmat.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lhpmat.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
lhpmat.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
lhpmat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lhpmat.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhpmat $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) -> ( P ./\ W ) = .0. ) $.
